docs.snippet: Alfredo Di Stefano, the player Real Madrid has hailed as the most important component in its mid-20th century ascent to becoming a global football powerhouse, has died. He was 88....
docs.lead_paragraph: Alfredo Di Stefano, the player Real Madrid has hailed as the most important component in its mid-20th century ascent to becoming a global football powerhouse, has died. He was 88.

headline.main: Real Madrid Great Di Stefano Dies at Age 88

docs.snippet: Former Italian World Cup coach Cesare Prandelli will replace Roberto Mancini as the next Galatasaray manager, the Turkish club announced on Monday....

docs.snippet: British consumer spending grew at the fastest rate in four years in the second quarter as soccer fans bought more food and drinks in supermarkets and pubs after the World Cup kicked off in June, a report from Visa Europe showed....
docs.lead_paragraph: British consumer spending grew at the fastest rate in four years in the second quarter as soccer fans bought more food and drinks in supermarkets and pubs after the World Cup kicked off in June, a report from Visa Europe showed.

headline.main: World Cup Lifts UK Consumer Spending Growth to 4-Year High in Second Quarter - Visa
headline.print_headline: World Cup Lifts UK Consumer Spending Growth to 4-Year High in Second Quarter - Visa

docs.snippet: Former England defender Ashley Cole has signed a two-year deal with AS Roma after leaving Chelsea at the end of last season, the Italian club said in a statement on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Former England defender Ashley Cole has signed a two-year deal with AS Roma after leaving Chelsea at the end of last season, the Italian club said in a statement on Monday.

headline.main: Ashley Cole Signs Two-Year Deal With Roma

docs.snippet: A federal judge in Philadelphia on Monday granted preliminary approval to a settlement between the National Football League and thousands of former players who have brain damage and dementia as a result of concussions suffered on the field....

headline.main: Judge Grants Preliminary Approval of Deal in NFL Concussion Suit
headline.print_headline: Judge Grants Preliminary Approval of Deal in NFL Concussion Suit

docs.snippet: Former New England Patriots player Aaron Hernandez can transfer to a jail closer to Boston for easier access to his lawyers while he awaits trial on a murder charge, a judge ruled Monday....

docs.snippet: Colombia defender Juan Camilo Zuniga will not be punished for the tackle on Neymar that left the Brazil striker with a broken bone in his back and forced him out of the rest of the World Cup....

docs.snippet: History weighs heavily on the shoulders of football players from Germany, a country that latches on to the glory of its three World Cup titles with special reverence - in part due to a shortage of national heroes after its belligerent 20th century...
docs.lead_paragraph: History weighs heavily on the shoulders of football players from Germany, a country that latches on to the glory of its three World Cup titles with special reverence - in part due to a shortage of national heroes after its belligerent 20th century.

headline.main: Germany Want Fourth World Cup to Fill Hole in Their Soul
headline.print_headline: Germany Want Fourth World Cup to Fill Hole in Their Soul
